com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface ProductAdjustment

public interface ProductAdjustment

An update for a Product that is being changed as part of a PriceAdjustment.

Method Summary
 void apply()
          Applies this adjustment to the product being changed.
 void create(ReportingClassAdjustment parent, PriceAdjustmentItemStruct newAdjustmentItem)
          Creates a valid instance.
 Product getAdjustedProduct()
          Gets the product being adjusted by this entry.
 ProductNameStruct getNewProductName()
          Gets the new product name of the product being adjusted.
 ProductNameStruct getProductName()
          Gets the product name of the product being adjusted.
 PendingNameStruct toPendingName()
          Convert this adjustment to a pending name struct.
 PriceAdjustmentItemStruct toStruct()
          Converts this item to a CORBA struct.
 void update(PriceAdjustmentItemStruct updatedItem)
          Updates this item with values from a CORBA struct.
 

Method Detail

apply

void apply()
           throws TransactionFailedException
Applies this adjustment to the product being changed.

Throws:
TransactionFailedException - if product adjustment cannot be applied

create

void create(ReportingClassAdjustment parent,
            PriceAdjustmentItemStruct newAdjustmentItem)
            throws DataValidationException
Creates a valid instance.

Parameters:
parent - the parent class adjustment of this item adjustment
newAdjustmentItem - CORBA struct containing values for this item
Throws:
DataValidationException - if validation checks fail

getAdjustedProduct

Product getAdjustedProduct()
Gets the product being adjusted by this entry. If the action == CREATE, this value will be null.

Returns:
reference to adjusted product

getNewProductName

ProductNameStruct getNewProductName()
Gets the new product name of the product being adjusted. This will be the name of the product after this adjustment is applied.

Returns:
CORBA struct containing new product name

getProductName

ProductNameStruct getProductName()
Gets the product name of the product being adjusted.

Returns:
CORBA struct containing product name

toPendingName

PendingNameStruct toPendingName()
Convert this adjustment to a pending name struct.

Returns:
struct containing pending name information

toStruct

PriceAdjustmentItemStruct toStruct()
Converts this item to a CORBA struct.

Returns:
CORBA struct containing values of this item

update

void update(PriceAdjustmentItemStruct updatedItem)
Updates this item with values from a CORBA struct.

Parameters:
updatedItem - CORBA struct containing new values
